Text:
Hey,
good choice again!!
One of my "mythic" movie!!
James Woods is just incredible & just love almost all Cronenberg's movies!!
Just one thing:
French subtitles availables??
Peace & big thanks!

Hi.

Unfortunately the sub-titles are limited... only english sub-titles available which doesn't make much sense.  I can assure you that it is untouched...  I guess Criterion doesn't put much premium on having sub-titles...

Personally I think they should put all kinds of subtitles on these discs, since they hardly take any space.
What DVD release is this? The only DVD I've ever seen of this movie (and the one I own) is single-disc, single-layer, 2.0 audio with only a trailer as extra...!

This is the 1st disc of the Criterion release.  There is one small extra on the disc, and 3 audio tracks:

1) dolby digital 2.0 mono (english)
2) commentary track with Cronenburg
3) commentary track with James Woods / Debbie Harry

Mono is a bummer I know .. but that's how the movie was apparently made (in 1983), and enjoyment of the film doesn't depend on audio that much IMO.

You can find some more information here:

http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/B0002DB50E/104-7487384-1327147?v=glance

Hope this helps.

Thank you for this one! :D

I won't let you down -- will keep seeding for sure, but like I said I may disappear for a couple hours a day to play online games :)  Probably not for the next couple days though because I have lots of work to do.

This is probably my favourite Cronenberg movie.

Enjoy!
